name: Update 4.6.4
body: Fixes localization issues (wrong behaviour, missing placeholders) in a few languages.

name: Update 4.6.3
body:
Adds Vietnamese and Arabic localizations
The locale select dialog has also been updated

name: Update 4.6.2
body: New text colors and a ton of code refactoring, hopefully fixing some bugs.

name: Hotfix Update 4.6.1
body: Fixes a crash where setting custom DNF threshold to 0 and getting more DNFs than the trim size in a row would crash the app

name: Update 4.6.0
body:
This update introduces a new algorithm for calculating custom-trimmed averages!

Also added:
* Manual mode! 
  * Can be toggled on in the settings. It'll add a button on the main timer screen for quick access to manual entry
  * Manual entry has also been improved: You can now add penalties and a comment before saving your time
* Pinch-zoom on the graph has been replaced with an individual axis zoom, allowing you to zoom horizontally and vertically separately
* Many little UI tweaks, mainly on the popup menus.

name: Update 4.3.2
body:
This update features many UI tweaks for app consistency and fluidity all across the board!

Key new features:
+ You can now unarchive solves! Tap the overflow button in the time list search box to get started.
+ Three new themes, plus some extra tweaks to some existing ones
+ Dark themes are now darker
+ Two new languages: Slovak and Japanese.

name: Update 4.2.5
body:
### Cumulative changelog from 4.2.0 to current:
- Redesign of some key features of the app:
  - Tab bar and action bar are now tinted with the app theme
  - Category and theme selection are now a dialog instead of a bottom sheet
  - Reduced some of the roundness in most dialogs and the search box
  - New timer start animation

- New customization options:
  - Customize the timer text color
  - Tint the navigation bar

- Quality of life changes:
  - Share your backup file after exporting
  - Timer text now resizes to fit screen if it's too big for one line
  - The app now remembers your last used puzzle
  - Worst time stat has been replaced by Mean

- New language: 
  - Turkish

#### Fixed a lot of crashes and bugs, including:
  - Back to cancel solve now behaves correctly
  - Disable drawer menu during a solve

### In this version:
- Added share option to export dialog
- The app now remembers the last used puzzle

name: Update 4.2.3
body:
### Fixes:
+ Fixed a ton of crashes from views being accessed before being created or after being destroyed.
+ Disable drawer menu during a solve

name: Update 4.2.4
body:
### New features:
+ Navigation bar icons are now tinted according to contrast with the theme color

name: Update 4.2.2
body:
### New features:
+ Redesign of the app theme select dialog

### Fixes:
+ Various crash and ANR fixes
+ Scramble box boundary calculation

name: Update 4.2.1
body:
### New features:
+ New start timer animation
+ Timer text now resizes to fit screen

### Tweaks:
+ Fix stats text size
+ Worst time stat has been replaced by Mean
+ New donation option

name: Update 4.2.0
body:
### New features:
+ Redesign of some key features of the app.
+ Customize the timer text color.
+ Tint the navigation bar.

### Tweaks:
+ Disabled tapping the scramble box to open scramble details
+ Changed average record position
+ PB average now counts all-time averages

### Bugs fixed
+ Back to cancel solve now behaves correctly

### Also:
+ New language: Turkish
+ Various localization improvements.

name: Update 3.0.0b1
body:
# New features
* New Stats and Settings page layout
* Inspection alerts (thanks to @aswna)
* Average records alerts (thanks to @druidalek)
* New stats: deviation and total time
* You can now choose which sides you want the cross hints to show.,
* Back button behaviour can now be toggled off in settings
* Made app movable to SD card
# Fixes
* Rotating the screen no longer resets the scramble (thanks to @freundTech)
* Fixed an issue where layout would look wonky in devices with RTL languages
* Fixed leftover inspection +2 bug
* Fixed 4x4 and 5x5 showing BLD scrambles.

name: Update 2.0.0
body:
All features of the previous beta releases, plus:
- Changed graph table strings for better readability
- Added flag icon to "Language" preference in Settings

name: Update 2.0.0b2
body:
## New themes:
- Cyan
- Light Green
- Light Blue

## New localisations:
- German
- Spanish
- Polish
- Also added option to change language

## Fixed issues:
- Fixed an issue where some devices would not lock orientation upon timer start
- Fixed an issue where pressing back in inspection would crash the app (#69)
- Fixed an issue where some text imports would crash the app (#68)

name: Update 2.0.0b1
body:
- Graph page has been completely revamped with much more detailed statistics
- Added French, Lithuanian and Russian translations.
- Multiple performance and stability improvements.

name: Update 1.2.0
body:
## New features:
- Cross finder ( #15 )
- Back button to cancel solve ( #17 )
- Option to hide time when solving ( #14 )
- Option to change scramble image size ( #12 )
- PB mean of 3 ( #11)
- Option to make QAB bigger ( #7 )
- Option to adjust scramble text size ( #3 )
- Option to add a visual cue that the timer will start ( #1 )

## Fixes:
- Fixed database-related memory leaks
- Add category to list even if the user hasn't done any solves on it ( #6 )
